definition: to quarrel/to make a noise/noisy/to disturb by making a noise

sentences.english: They rushed clamorously into the presence of the lioness, and demanded of her the settlement of the dispute.
sentences.chinese: 他们吵吵嚷嚷，跑到母狮面前，请她解决争端。

sentences.english: The noisy fellow was thrown out of the hall.
sentences.chinese: 这个吵吵嚷嚷的家伙被人从大厅里撵出去了。

sentences.english: Beauty knows to say :"Enough, "barbarism clamours for still more.
sentences.chinese: 美懂得去说“足矣”，粗野却吵嚷着要再多一分。

sentences.english: A bitter controversy about the siting of the airport is rumbling in the designing institute.
sentences.chinese: 设计院里正吵吵嚷嚷着对机场选址问题作激烈争论。

sentences.english: They began to curse and shout in a babble of languages.
sentences.chinese: 他们开始用不同的语言叽里咕噜地谩骂吵嚷起来。

sentences.english: The gang are screaming for the immediate release of their leader.
sentences.chinese: 那帮人吵嚷著要求立即释放他们的头儿。

sentences.english: They burst boisterously into the room.
sentences.chinese: 他们吵吵嚷嚷地闯入房间。

sentences.english: Beauty knows to say, "Enough", barbarism clamours for still more.
sentences.chinese: 美懂得去说“足矣”，粗野却吵嚷着再多一分。

sentences.english: He was not at ease with me, and much of his bluster rose from timidity .
sentences.chinese: 和我在一起他就不自在，他的吵嚷大都是由于怯懦。

sentences.english: They are clamorous for better pay.
sentences.chinese: 他们吵吵嚷嚷要求增加工资。

sentences.english: They clamoured for the fair treatment.
sentences.chinese: 他吵嚷着要求公平对待。

sentences.english: The gang was screaming for the immediate release of their leader.
sentences.chinese: 那帮人吵嚷着要求立即释放他们的头儿。

sentences.english: He clamoured against the unfair treatment.
sentences.chinese: 他吵嚷着要求公平对待。

sentences.english: The end in the home must be uncovered not boil, 2 child are clamouring look for dad to want to eat.
sentences.chinese: 家里穷得揭不开锅，二娃吵嚷着找爹爹要吃的。

sentences.english: I can't stand people shouting and pushing.
sentences.chinese: 我不能容忍人们大声吵嚷和乱冲乱撞。

definition: noisy and in disarray/in an uproar
to shout and quarrel/to make a big fuss
to argue noisily/to shout/to make widely known/to reproach
variant of 鬧哄哄|闹哄哄[nao4 hong1 hong1]
